title: Far Right Northern League courts Italy's south
text:
Far Right Northern League courts Italy's south 6:06pm GMT - 01:39 
Italy's far-right Northern League party once derided the south as crime-riddled and parasitic. Now, it's courting votes there on its anti-immigrant platform.   
Italy's far-right Northern League party once derided the south as crime-riddled and parasitic. Now, it's courting votes there on its anti-immigrant platform.  //reut.rs/2sjV00H
